other_tests.findings: The first biopsy was mildly abnormal; the follow-up biopsy showed myopathic features with vacuoles, which were prominent.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progressed from mildly abnormal findings to prominent vacuoles and marked myopathic features.

other_tests.findings: Relative preservation of the quadriceps muscle compared to dense atrophy in other muscle groups.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Preserved relative sparing of the quadriceps muscle persisted even 8 years later.
